title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 261.2 - Suspension or other sanctions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 261.2 - Suspension or other sanctions

State Regulations

Misconduct by an attorney or other representative before
the agency, including but not limited to misconduct at a hearing, shall be
grounds for discipline. Such misconduct, if of an aggravated character, may be
grounds for suspension and for prohibiting the attorney or representative from
practice before the agency and for other sanctions after due notice and a
hearing before the board or its designee. Any order of a hearing officer
imposing discipline under this section will be appealable to the board as part
of an appeal of the ultimate disposition of the underlying proceeding pursuant
to section
253.22
of this

Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
